## Stringr Quiz

```{r str-detect, echo = FALSE}
quiz(
  question("Which function would you use to find out if a given string contains a particular pattern?",
    answer("`str_count()`"),
    answer("`str_subset()`"),
    answer("`str_c()`"),
    answer("`str_detect()`", correct = TRUE))
)
```
